thread.title: Zakarun Turai: Barcelona ta sha kashi a hannu PSG - Wasanni - RFI
thread.title_full: Zakarun Turai: Barcelona ta sha kashi a hannu PSG - Wasanni - RFI

author: Umaymah Sani Abdulmumin
title: Zakarun Turai: Barcelona ta sha kashi a hannu PSG - Wasanni - RFI
text:
Wanda aka canza zuwa 15-02-2017 A 08:58 Ángel Di María na PSG ne ya zurawa Barcelona kwallaye 2 a raga FRANCK FIFE / AFP 
Kociyan Barcelona Luis Enrique ya ce sun riga sun amince, na su ya zo karshe, a gasar zakarun Turan wannan kaka, bayan lalasa su da PSG ta yi da ci 4-0, a wasan kungiyoyin 16 karshen da suka fafata jiya talata. 
Angel Di Maria da ke cika shekaru 29 da haihuwa jiya, shi ya zurawa PSG Kwallaye 2, yayin da Julian Draxler da Edinson Cavani da suma ke cika shekaru 30, kowanne ya zura kwallo guda a raga. 
Wannan sakamako ya bai wa PSG dama tsallakewa zuwa kwata final a karo na biyar cikin wasan kakanin 5, Yayin da Barcelona wannan ke kasance mata karon farko da ake fitar da ita a wannan matakin tun karawarsu da Liverpool a shekarar 2007. 
‘Yan wasan Barca da dama ne suka nuna bakin cikinsu da fiddasu, ko a shekarar 2013 Bayern Munich ta yiwa Barca irin wannan ci a wasan dab dana karshe. 
Kazalika a 1997, Dynamo Kiev ta fidda Barca da ci 4-0 
Sai AC Milan a shekarar 1994 da ita ma ta hanata tsallakewa bayan zura mata yawan irin wannan kwallaye a raga. 
A tarihin gasar Zakarun Turai ba a taba samun kungiyar da ta cike gibin da aka ba ta na kwallaye hudu ba. 
Ko da dai a ranar 8 ga watan Maris Za su karbi bakuncin PSG a zagaye na biyu. 
'Yan wasan Barca da aka sani da kasance cike da kuzari, a wannan karon kamar ruwa ya doke su, Inda Messi, wanda ake gani na da sirrin zura kwallo ya tafka kura-kurai da dama. 
Yanzu dai Barca na cikin tsaka-mai-wuya domin kuwa ba karamin kokari za ta yi ba idan tana son ci gaba da zama a cikin gasar.
